description:
Artopium.com is a online art, music, fashion, film and book consignment service that empowers artists to take control of the sale of their own works. The My Artopium App enables artists, musicians, fashion designers, filmmakers, authors and more to sign up to the website and add their works for sale or just for display only. Doing this directly from your phone allows you to use the built in camera feature  to capture images of your work and then to upload them directly to the site without having to connect your phone to a laptop.

Every artist who signs up gets a well designed profile page that displays your basic info and lists your creative works for sale in the order you select in your options. Log into the website for more control and destails such and visitor statistics, reviews, messages, and more.
versionNote:
* Logging was updated to be compatible on hard device and not just emulator.

* Cookie management was upgraded to handle the removal of cookies from previous accounts before the sign up of a new account.

* A bug in the back-end scripts that prevented proper login after a new sign up was fixed.
